member.name: M:Sandbox.AccessControl.VerifyAssembly(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns true if assembly is fine. Previous errors are cleared at the start of this method so only new Errors are set if returning false.

member.name: M:Sandbox.AccessControl.InitTouches(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Clear the touches and fill them with everything this dll touches

member.name: M:Sandbox.AccessControl.ForgetAssembly(System.String)
member.summary: If we're definitely never goinug to see this assembly again (because it's being unloaded for instance) We can totally get rid of it and free all that lovely memory.

member.name: M:Sandbox.AccessControl.RemoveLocalTouches
member.summary: Remove touches that are inside addon depends or this dll.

member.name: M:Sandbox.AccessRules.IsInWhitelist(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if call is in the whitelist
